Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.7 Pañhāvāra » 12.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 12.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Sekkhattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
42.
1771Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1772Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sekkhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
1773Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
1774Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa. (Tīṇi.)
1775Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  nevasekkhanāsekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
